headline: Svelte, a bright future with Snowpack
alternativeHeadline: Echoing Richard Harris announcements in Svelte Summit 2020: Sapper 1.0 never gonna happen, the new Svelte Kit, Snowpack as build tool, Javascript Module System.
description: Echoing Richard Harris announcements in Svelte Summit 2020: Sapper 1.0 never gonna happen, the new Svelte Kit, Snowpack as build tool, Javascript Module System.
